title: Contact Schema
description: The Contact Archetype - Essential properties that define a contact

contact_address.description:
To add multiple address lines, use 
. For example, 1234 Glücklichkeit Straße
Hinterhaus 5. Etage li.

contact_city.description: The city or town where the contact is located.

contact_region.description: The general region where the contact is located.  Can be a US state, or a province, for instance.

category.description: General category of the contact, e.g. Friends, Family, etc.

subcategory.description: Specific category of the contact, e.g. Best Friends, Parent, etc

_id.description: Unique identifier for this email address

created.description: Date and time the email address was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

updated.description: Date and time the email address was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD
